titleStmt.title: Grapes from Canaan, or, The believers present taste of future glory expressed in a short divine poem, the issue of spare hours, and published at the request, and for the entertainment of those whose hopes are above their present enjoyments.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Francis, 1590-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.L. for the author ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
